customized_approach_objective: PAN confidentiality is maintained during display.

title: Anti-Phishing Mechanisms
text: Processes and automated mechanisms are in place to detect and protect personnel against phishing attacks.
customized_approach_objective: Personnel are protected from phishing attacks that could compromise the CDE.

text: An inventory of bespoke and custom software is maintained to facilitate vulnerability and patch management.
customized_approach_objective: All custom software is known and managed to prevent vulnerabilities.

title: Password Complexity
column9: Authentication credentials are sufficiently complex to prevent guessing attacks.

title: Password History
text: Individuals are prevented from submitting a new password that is the same as any of the last four passwords used.
customized_approach_objective: Compromised or old passwords are not reused.

title: App/System Passwords
text: Passwords/passphrases for application and system accounts are protected against misuse.

title: Change and Tamper Detection
text: A change- and tamper-detection mechanism is deployed to alert personnel to unauthorized modification of HTTP headers and the contents of payment pages.
customized_approach_objective: Unauthorized changes to payment pages are detected promptly.

title: PCI Scope Documentation
text: PCI DSS scope is documented and confirmed by the entity at least once every 12 months.
customized_approach_objective: The scope of the CDE is accurately defined and maintained.

title: PAN Leak Response
text: The incident response plan includes coverage for alerts from the change- and tamper-detection mechanism (Requirement 11.6.1) and detection of unencrypted PAN.
customized_approach_objective: Response to PAN leaks is timely and effective.
